card.name: Acrobatic Maneuver
card.property: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Renegades find ever more creative ways to work around the Consulate's aether regulations.

card.name: Aerial Responder
card.property: Flying, vigilance, lifelink

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dwarves have an instinct for repair, an inherent understanding of how systems work, and a reputation for fearlessness. They're perfect candidates for the Fair's emergency response team.

card.name: Aetherstorm Roc
card.property: Flying Whenever Aetherstorm Roc or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you get {E} (an energy counter). Whenever Aetherstorm Roc attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it and tap up to one target creature defending player controls.

card.name: Angel of Invention
card.property: Flying, vigilance, lifelink Fabricate 2 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.) Other creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Authority of the Consuls
card.property: Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Citizens are free to do as they wish, within the confines of the Consulate's laws.

card.name: Aviary Mechanic
card.property: When Aviary Mechanic enters the battlefield, you may return another permanent you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pilots take crippled skyships to the Aviaries, trusting Ghirapur's most talented mechanics to get them back into the air.

card.name: Built to Last
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's an artifact creature, it gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Consulate-built automatons have a lifetime warranty.

card.name: Captured by the Consulate
card.property: Enchant creature you don't control Enchanted creature can't attack. Whenever an opponent casts a spell, if it has a single target, change the target to enchanted creature if able.

card.name: Cataclysmic Gearhulk
card.property: Vigilance When Cataclysmic Gearhulk enters the battlefield, each player chooses an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a planeswalker from among the nonland permanents he or she controls, then sacrifices the rest.

card.name: Consulate Surveillance
card.property: When Consulate Surveillance enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E}{E} (four energy counters). Pay {E}{E}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by a source of your choice.

card.name: Consul's Shieldguard
card.property: When Consul's Shieldguard enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Consul's Shieldguard attacks, you may pay {E}. If you do, another target attacking creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Eddytrail Hawk
card.property: Flying When Eddytrail Hawk enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Eddytrail Hawk attacks, you may pay {E}. If you do, another target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Fairgrounds Warden
card.property: When Fairgrounds Warden enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Fairgrounds Warden leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Fragmentize
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment with converted mana cost 4 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Too much friction on your bearings, your countersinking is inconsistent, and there are lines in your casting. Dispose of it, and begin again." —Dovin Baan

card.name: Fumigate
card.property: Destroy all creatures. You gain 1 life for each creature destroyed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ghirapur's gremlin population poses a threat to the infrastructure of the fairgrounds. Threats must be eliminated." —Sram, senior edificer

card.name: Gearshift Ace
card.property: First strike Whenever Gearshift Ace crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some display their trophies at the Hall of Mechanists. Others display their talent in the streets of Ghirapur.

card.name: Glint-Sleeve Artisan
card.property: Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)

card.name: Herald of the Fair
card.property: When Herald of the Fair enters the battlefield, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Welcome, one and all! Right this way! Open your eyes, your ears, and your imaginations to the wonders of the Inventors' Fair!"

card.name: Impeccable Timing
card.property: Impeccable Timing deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Baral constructed his trap for Chandra, he did not account for the arrival of an enormous leonin wielding a twin-headed axe.

card.name: Inspired Charge
card.property: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One dwarf on a build team ensures competence. All dwarves on the team ensures brilliance.

card.name: Master Trinketeer
card.property: Servos and Thopters you control get +1/+1. {3}{W}: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let us never forget the joy that lies at the heart of invention."

card.name: Ninth Bridge Patrol
card.property: Whenever another creature you control leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Ninth Bridge Patrol.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Consulate keeps watch at each of the eleven bridges to ensure that the market remains a haven for commerce, not for con artists.

card.name: Pressure Point
card.property: Tap target creature. Draw a card.

card.name: Propeller Pioneer
card.property: Flying Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sky isn't the limit. It's the starting point."

card.name: Refurbish
card.property: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's no reason to buy a new one when I've got the tools to fix the one you've got." —Ripu, repair specialist

card.name: Revoke Privileges
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack, block, or crew Vehicles.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By order of Consulate Mandate 482, I am required to detain you, citizen."

card.name: Servo Exhibition
card.property: Create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The judges really put them through their paces, but they prevailed. I think they even impressed Head Judge Tezzeret." —Ritika, artificer

card.name: Skyswirl Harrier
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The great birds dive through the sky, wings skimming the aether streams, to fall upon their unsuspecting prey.

card.name: Skywhaler's Shot
card.property: Destroy target creature with power 3 or greater. Scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the moment of truth, it is as though time stands still, and the whale waits, suspended in the sky.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no dress code for the Inventors' Fair, but you'll be hard-pressed to find anyone or anything not done up in their finest.

card.name: Thriving Ibex
card.property: When Thriving Ibex enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Thriving Ibex attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Textiles at the Inventors' Fair feature threads from every corner of Kaladesh.

card.name: Toolcraft Exemplar
card.property: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control an artifact, Toolcraft Exemplar gets +2/+1 until end of turn. If you control three or more artifacts, it also gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you wish to produce the finest work, you must start with the finest tools."

card.name: Trusty Companion
card.property: Vigilance Trusty Companion can't attack alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It shows affection an automaton never could.

card.name: Visionary Augmenter
card.property: Fabricate 2 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a multifunctional radial extension system with superlateral, force-amplifying rigging. Of course it will win."

card.name: Wispweaver Angel
card.property: Flying When Wispweaver Angel enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Aether Meltdown
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature or Vehicle When Aether Meltdown enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Enchanted permanent gets -4/-0.

card.name: Aether Theorist
card.property: When Aether Theorist enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters). {T}, Pay {E}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Aether Tradewinds
card.property: Return target permanent you control and target permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Consulate engineers have developed safe methods of harvesting aether, but renegades aren't always so careful.

card.name: Aethersquall Ancient
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters). Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}: Return all other creatures to their owners' hands. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Ceremonious Rejection
card.property: Counter target colorless spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The judges at the Fair are held in such high esteem that a nod of recognition can inspire an inventor for a lifetime—and a wave of dismissal can end a career.

card.name: Confiscation Coup
card.property: Choose target artifact or creature. You get {E}{E}{E}{E} (four energy counters), then you may pay an amount of {E} equal to that permanent's converted mana cost. If you do, gain control of it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Citizens, do not resist. This is for your safety. Tezzeret bids you to surrender your inventions. Now."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Step right up! Try your hand! It'll thrill the senses and boggle the mind!"

card.name: Disappearing Act
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Disappearing Act, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand. Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Baral took my family from me back then. I'd do anything to face him now." —Chandra Nalaar

card.name: Dramatic Reversal
card.property: Untap all nonland permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nobody asked you to butt in, Jace. But thanks." —Chandra Nalaar

card.name: Era of Innovation
card.property: Whenever an artifact or Artificer enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}, Sacrifice Era of Innovation: Draw three cards.

card.name: Experimental Aviator
card.property: Flying When Experimental Aviator enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The little thopters seemed lonely up here, so I thought I'd join them."

card.name: Failed Inspection
card.property: Counter target spell. Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most dangerous thing an artificer can do is believe an invention is perfect.

card.name: Gearseeker Serpent
card.property: Gearseeker Serpent costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control. {5}{U}: Gearseeker Serpent can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its collection is vast, yet each ship has a special place in its heart.

card.name: Glimmer of Genius
card.property: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Creators live for that moment of inspiration: precious, profound, perfect.

card.name: Glint-Nest Crane
card.property: Flying When Glint-Nest Crane enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Hightide Hermit
card.property: Defender When Hightide Hermit enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E}{E} (four energy counters). Pay {E}{E}: Hightide Hermit can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Insidious Will
card.property: Choose one — • Counter target spell. • You may choose new targets for target spell. • Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We meet again, pyromancer." —Baral, Chief of Compliance

card.name: Janjeet Sentry
card.property: When Janjeet Sentry enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). {T}, Pay {E}{E}: You may tap or untap target artifact or creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Janjeet Observatory is open to the public, but access to the adjoining laboratories is restricted.

card.name: Long-Finned Skywhale
card.property: Flying Long-Finned Skywhale can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The aethersphere is home to the most wondrous beings on all of Kaladesh, although the dangers of traversing it mean that not much is known of them.

card.name: Malfunction
card.property: Enchant artifact or creature When Malfunction enters the battlefield, tap enchanted permanent. Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They don't make them like they used to."

card.name: Metallurgic Summonings
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create an X/X colorless Construct artifact creature token, where X is that spell's converted mana cost. {3}{U}{U}, Exile Metallurgic Summonings: Return all instant and sorcery cards from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only if you control six or more artifacts.

card.name: Minister of Inquiries
card.property: When Minister of Inquiries enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). {T}, Pay {E}: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Nimble Innovator
card.property: When Nimble Innovator enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A failure is simply another opportunity for improvement. Just wait until you see what I come up with next."

card.name: Padeem, Consul of Innovation
card.property: Artifacts you control have hexproof. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control the artifact with the highest converted mana cost or tied for the highest converted mana cost, draw a card.

card.name: Paradoxical Outcome
card.property: Return any number of target nonland, nontoken permanents you control to their owners' hands. Draw a card for each card returned to your hand this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The results of Rashmi's experimentation forced her to consider the possibility that multitudinous realities existed beyond her own.

card.name: Revolutionary Rebuff
card.property: Counter target nonartifact spell unless its controller pays {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By the time a Consulate sanction becomes official, the renegade quicksmiths have already found a way to circumvent it.

card.name: Saheeli's Artistry
card.property: Choose one or both — • Create a token that's a copy of target artifact. • Create a token that's a copy of target creature, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From the first touch, I know exactly what the metal wants to be."

card.name: Select for Inspection
card.property: Return target tapped creature to its owner's hand. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Shrewd Negotiation
card.property: Exchange control of target artifact you control and target artifact or creature you don't control.

card.name: Tezzeret's Ambition
card.property: Draw three cards. If you control no artifacts, discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To achieve what none have achieved before, one must dare what none have dared before."

card.name: Thriving Turtle
card.property: When Thriving Turtle enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Thriving Turtle attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Aether shapes everything on Kaladesh, from the sky to the sea.

card.name: Torrential Gearhulk
card.property: Flash When Torrential Gearhulk enters the battlefield, you may cast target instant card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that card would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Vedalken Blademaster
card.property: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vedalken have six thin, agile fingers on each hand, giving them unparalleled dexterity.

card.name: Weldfast Wingsmith
card.property: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Weldfast Wingsmith gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Airships are too confining. If I'm in the sky, I want to feel the wind in my hair and taste the aether."

card.name: Wind Drake
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Drakes prowl the skies of Kaladesh, waiting for the perfect moment to strike.

card.name: Aetherborn Marauder
card.property: Flying, lifelink When Aetherborn Marauder enters the battlefield, move any number of +1/+1 counters from other permanents you control onto Aetherborn Marauder.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't know what that is or who it belongs to, but it's shiny and I want it."

card.name: Ambitious Aetherborn
card.property: Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Aetherborn who are unwilling to accept the decomposition of their bodies invent ways to preserve and augment themselves.

card.name: Demon of Dark Schemes
card.property: Flying When Demon of Dark Schemes enters the battlefield, all other creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Whenever another creature dies, you get {E} (an energy counter). {2}{B}, Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control tapped.

card.name: Dhund Operative
card.property: As long as you control an artifact, Dhund Operative gets +1/+0 and has deathtouch. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Baral's spies always have the latest technology.

card.name: Diabolic Tutor
card.property: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Show them. Show them how hot your fire can burn." —Liliana Vess, to Chandra Nalaar

card.name: Die Young
card.property: Choose target creature. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters), then you may pay any amount of {E}. The creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each {E} paid this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the time comes, let go. Nothing lasts forever."

card.name: Dukhara Scavenger
card.property: When Dukhara Scavenger enters the battlefield, you may put target artifact or creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Eliminate the Competition
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Eliminate the Competition, sacrifice X creatures. Destroy X target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Open hostilities are strictly forbidden at the Inventors' Fair, but "accidents" still happen.

card.name: Embraal Bruiser
card.property: Embraal Bruiser enters the battlefield tapped. Embraal Bruiser has menace as long as you control an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Embraal, inventor gangs defend their turf with ingenious devices and blunt objects.

card.name: Essence Extraction
card.property: Essence Extraction deals 3 damage to target creature and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The "gifted" among the aetherborn can draw the life essence of other living beings into themselves.

card.name: Fortuitous Find
card.property: Choose one or both — • Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand. • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An aetherborn wastes neither time nor treasure.

card.name: Foundry Screecher
card.property: Flying Foundry Screecher gets +1/+0 as long as you control an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My creations still can't match the dive speed of those floppy-winged mammals. Maybe I should enter one of them in the Fair." —Viprikti, thopterist

card.name: Fretwork Colony
card.property: Fretwork Colony can't block. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Fretwork Colony and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The swarm leaves behind a flawless pattern that only occasionally threatens the structural integrity of the wood.

card.name: Gonti, Lord of Luxury
card.property: Deathtouch When Gonti, Lord of Luxury enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of target opponent's library, exile one of them face down, then put the rest on the bottom of that library in a random order. You may look at and cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.

card.name: Harsh Scrutiny
card.property: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a creature card from it. That player discards that card. Scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you've done nothing wrong, you have nothing to fear." —Enforcer-Chief Ranaj

card.name: Lawless Broker
card.property: When Lawless Broker dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kaladesh's illicit marketplaces are known as "night markets," but if you know who to ask, you can find what you're looking for at any time of the day.

card.name: Live Fast
card.property: You draw two cards, lose 2 life, and get {E}{E} (two energy counters).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you have the chance, take it. Laugh, sing, dance. Don't allow the night to end."

card.name: Lost Legacy
card.property: Choose a nonartifact, nonland card name. Search target player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. That player shuffles his or her library, then draws a card for each card exiled from hand this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That name shall not be spoken." —Baral, Chief of Compliance

card.name: Make Obsolete
card.property: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Marionette Master
card.property: Fabricate 3 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put three +1/+1 counters on it or create three 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.) Whenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to Marionette Master's power.

card.name: Maulfist Squad
card.property: Menace Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)

card.name: Midnight Oil
card.property: Midnight Oil enters the battlefield with seven hour counters on it. At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card and remove two hour counters from Midnight Oil. Your maximum hand size is equal to the number of hour counters on Midnight Oil. Whenever you discard a card, you lose 1 life.

card.name: Mind Rot
card.property: Target player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many an inventor has collapsed under the pressure to create a flawless design.

card.name: Morbid Curiosity
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Morbid Curiosity, sacrifice an artifact or creature. Draw cards equal to the converted mana cost of the sacrificed permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every creation carries a piece of its creators. Their knowledge, their dreams, their soul. That is the best part."

card.name: Night Market Lookout
card.property: Whenever Night Market Lookout becomes tapped, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Consulate rarely cracks the coded announcement of a night market's location before dawn, and enforcers are taken care of if they wander too close.

card.name: Noxious Gearhulk
card.property: Menace When Noxious Gearhulk enters the battlefield, you may destroy another target creature. If a creature is destroyed this way, you gain life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Ovalchase Daredevil
card.property: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Ovalchase Daredevil from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let me guess. You thought I was dead."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's rare that the Prakhata Club closes its doors. It's also rare that Lord Gonti meets with Consul Kambal. What are the odds the two would occur on the same day?

card.name: Rush of Vitality
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains lifelink and indestructible until end of turn. (Damage dealt by that creature also causes its controller to gain that much life, and it can't be destroyed by damage or effects that say "destroy.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Short lives lead to forbidden choices.

card.name: Subtle Strike
card.property: Choose one or both — • Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Renegades do some of their best work right under the Consulate's nose.

card.name: Syndicate Trafficker
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on Syndicate Trafficker. It gains indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The price isn't negotiable, but I'm sure you'll agree it's fair."

card.name: Thriving Rats
card.property: When Thriving Rats enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Thriving Rats attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Ghirapur, even the lowliest residents live in lavish surroundings.

card.name: Tidy Conclusion
card.property: Destroy target creature. You gain 1 life for each artifact you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Aetherborn patrons use any means necessary to secure victory for their protégés.

card.name: Underhanded Designs
card.property: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {1}{B}, Sacrifice Underhanded Designs: Destroy target creature. Activate this ability only if you control two or more artifacts.

card.name: Weaponcraft Enthusiast
card.property: Fabricate 2 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No, I don't believe they have the proper permits for those, but I'm not going to be the one to ask." —Caru, Consulate warden

card.name: Aethertorch Renegade
card.property: When Aethertorch Renegade enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E}{E} (four energy counters). {T}, Pay {E}{E}: Aethertorch Renegade deals 1 damage to target creature. {T}, Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}: Aethertorch Renegade deals 6 damage to target player.

card.name: Brazen Scourge
card.property: Haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Driven by an insatiable hunger, gremlins never cease feeding. They can destroy a lifetime of work in just a few moments.

card.name: Built to Smash
card.property: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If it's an artifact creature, it gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Free from Consulate regulations, renegade-built automatons push performance to the limit.

card.name: Cathartic Reunion
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Cathartic Reunion, discard two cards. Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The chasm of years and worlds collapsed under the power of their embrace.

card.name: Chandra, Torch of Defiance
card.property: +1: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card. If you don't, Chandra, Torch of Defiance deals 2 damage to each opponent. +1: Add {R}{R} to your mana pool. −3: Chandra, Torch of Defiance deals 4 damage to target creature. −7: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, this emblem deals 5 damage to target creature or player."

card.name: Chandra's Pyrohelix
card.property: Chandra's Pyrohelix deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This one's for my mom, and this one's for me."

card.name: Combustible Gearhulk
card.property: First strike When Combustible Gearhulk enters the battlefield, target opponent may have you draw three cards. If the player doesn't, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard, then Combustible Gearhulk deals damage to that player equal to the total converted mana cost of those cards.

card.name: Demolish
card.property: Destroy target artifact or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most came to Ghirapur for the Fair. Gremlins came for the feast.

card.name: Fateful Showdown
card.property: Fateful Showdown deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of cards in your hand. Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tonight at the Grand Exhibition, witness Head Judge Tezzeret face off against the infamous renegade Pia Nalaar.

card.name: Furious Reprisal
card.property: Furious Reprisal deals 2 damage to each of two target creatures and/or players.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now that's the Chandra I've been waiting to see." —Liliana Vess

card.name: Giant Spectacle
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has menace.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The giant-decorating contest at the migration festival is a tradition that may have started as a dare.

card.name: Harnessed Lightning
card.property: Choose target creature. You get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters), then you may pay any amount of {E}. Harnessed Lightning deals that much damage to that creature.

card.name: Hijack
card.property: Gain control of target artifact or creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whoa there. Easy. We're just going to take a little detour."

card.name: Incendiary Sabotage
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Incendiary Sabotage, sacrifice an artifact. Incendiary Sabotage deals 3 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All of those Consulate safety measures undone with one simple tweak."

card.name: Inventor's Apprentice
card.property: Inventor's Apprentice gets +1/+1 as long as you control an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everyone starts off making garbage. If you finally make something halfway decent, it'll be the best day of your life." —Nehra, inventor

card.name: Lathnu Hellion
card.property: Haste When Lathnu Hellion enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice Lathnu Hellion unless you pay {E}{E}.

card.name: Madcap Experiment
card.property: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an artifact card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Madcap Experiment deals damage to you equal to the number of cards revealed this way.

card.name: Maulfist Doorbuster
card.property: When Maulfist Doorbuster enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Maulfist Doorbuster attacks, you may pay {E}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Pia Nalaar
card.property: When Pia Nalaar enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. {1}{R}: Target artifact creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Quicksmith Genius
card.property: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Quicksmiths are eager to jump from one project to the next, relying on flashes of inspiration rather than careful research.

card.name: Reckless Fireweaver
card.property: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Reckless Fireweaver deals 1 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Architects find inspiration in the dragon's beauty of form, while artificers are influenced by the function of its fire.

card.name: Renegade Tactics
card.property: Target creature can't block this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nothing against you. It's just that waiting for Consulate clearance was never really my thing."

card.name: Ruinous Gremlin
card.property: {2} {R}, Sacrifice Ruinous Gremlin: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: City officials once sent twenty gleaming automatons to exterminate a nest of gremlins. They soon saw the error of their ways.

card.name: Salivating Gremlins
card.property: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Salivating Gremlins gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If an elf can dream it, a dwarf can build it, and a gremlin can eat it.

card.name: Skyship Stalker
card.property: Flying {R}: Skyship Stalker gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {R}: Skyship Stalker gains first strike until end of turn. {R}: Skyship Stalker gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Spark of Creativity
card.property: Choose target creature. Exile the top card of your library. You may have Spark of Creativity deal damage to that creature equal to the exiled card's converted mana cost. If you don't, you may play that card until end of turn.

card.name: Speedway Fanatic
card.property: Haste Whenever Speedway Fanatic crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If her vehicle even has a brake, she couldn't tell you which pedal it is.

card.name: Spireside Infiltrator
card.property: Whenever Spireside Infiltrator becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Consulate promised that we would all have access to aether. I'm just keeping them honest."

card.name: Spontaneous Artist
card.property: When Spontaneous Artist enters the battlefield, you get {E} (an energy counter). Pay {E}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Graffiti of the "leaking spire" symbol is found wherever the renegades have been.

card.name: Start Your Engines
card.property: Vehicles you control become artifact creatures until end of turn. Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Inventors from around the world have come to the Fair hoping their creations will fly, drive, or sail their way to a top prize.

card.name: Territorial Gorger
card.property: Trample Whenever you get one or more {E} (energy counters), Territorial Gorger gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Inventors have been known to capture gremlins with the intent to release them in a rival's workshop. More often than not, that plan backfires.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Consider this a high alert, people. Permission to destroy on sight. Either we take it down or it'll take down the Fair." —Pav, gremlin watch

card.name: Thriving Grubs
card.property: When Thriving Grubs enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Thriving Grubs attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Wayward Giant
card.property: Menace

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The giants follow the flow of aether, and twice a year it leads them through here. Lesson learned. More clearance is needed." —Sram, senior edificer

card.name: Welding Sparks
card.property: Welding Sparks deals X damage to target creature, where X is 3 plus the number of artifacts you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fires of invention burn in all of us. I fight for the freedom to unleash those flames." —Pia Nalaar

card.name: Appetite for the Unnatural
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd just let the monkey have it if I were you. You can make another, but the same can't be said of your fingers." —Turni, Greenwheel groundskeeper

card.name: Arborback Stomper
card.property: Trample When Arborback Stomper enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The power of aether draws creatures to it like a magnetic force, and those that are touched by it are forever altered.

card.name: Architect of the Untamed
card.property: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you get {E} (an energy counter). Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}: Create a 6/6 colorless Beast artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Next to her designs, life seems like a pale imitation.

card.name: Armorcraft Judge
card.property: When Armorcraft Judge enters the battlefield, draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Were she not a judge, she'd win the division herself.

card.name: Attune with Aether
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've never seen a world where aether weaves through every aspect of nature."

card.name: Blossoming Defense
card.property: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains hexproof until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who move harmoniously with the flow of aether can channel the power of the natural world.

card.name: Bristling Hydra
card.property: When Bristling Hydra enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters). Pay {E}{E}{E}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bristling Hydra. It gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to players this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Never before have there been so many brilliant minds and wondrous inventions in one place. Denizens from every corner of Kaladesh will flock to the once-in-a-lifetime Inventors' Fair.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Consulate guards who pursue fleeing renegades into the Cowl often become lost—occasionally permanently—in the city's wildest greenbelt.

card.name: Creeping Mold
card.property: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sanctions, mandates, regulations . . . These things mean nothing to the natural world.

Whenever Cultivator of Blades attacks, you may have other attacking creatures get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Cultivator of Blades's power.

card.property: Elegant Edgecrafters can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. Fabricate 2 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fairgoers were delighted to find that even outside the fairgrounds, Ghirapur was a city of wonders.

property.value: "They say Head Judge Tezzeret will be reviewing every invention at the Fair. I made sure to build something that will stand out." —Jehvani, Vahadar artificer

property.value: "Inspiration is reciprocal: we all have a responsibility to each other to create."

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Champion's Helm

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Crucible of Worlds

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By isolating liquid aether at room temperature, foundry hand Jitya Reyath has given us a glimpse of raw aetheric matter—the very stuff of the cosmos.

card.name: Gauntlet of Power
card.property: As Gauntlet of Power enters the battlefield, choose a color. Creatures of the chosen color get +1/+1. Whenever a basic land is tapped for mana of the chosen color, its controller adds one mana of that color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

card.name: Hangarback Walker
card.property: Hangarback Walker enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. When Hangarback Walker dies, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying for each +1/+1 counter on Hangarback Walker. {1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Hangarback Walker.

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Lotus Petal

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each of these intricate mechanical petals stores enough power to supply all of Ghirapur, if only for a fleeting moment.

card.name: Mana Crypt
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An utterly silent chamber, submitted by an artificer who wished to remain anonymous.

card.name: Mana Vault
card.property: Mana Vault doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4}. If you do, untap Mana Vault. At the beginning of your draw step, if Mana Vault is tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Mind's Eye
card.property: Whenever an opponent draws a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Developed and tested by researchers at the Consulate's House of Knowledge, these devices allow anyone to see with a visionary's eye.

card.name: Mox Opal
card.property: Metalcraft — {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On loan from a private collection, this unique mechanism extracts power from a carefully prepared gemstone.

card.name: Painter's Servant
card.property: As Painter's Servant enters the battlefield, choose a color. All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are the chosen color in addition to their other colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This whimsical automaton helps create beautiful murals, then stands guard as they dry.

card.name: Rings of Brighthearth
card.property: Whenever you activate an ability, if it isn't a mana ability, you may pay {2}. If you do, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Crafted in emulation of dwarven hearth decorations, these devices doubled the output of Amrit Vatyam's forges.

card.name: Scroll Rack
card.property: {1}, {T}: Exile any number of cards from your hand face down. Put that many cards from the top of your library into your hand. Then look at the exiled cards and put them on top of your library in any order.

card.name: Sculpting Steel
card.property: You may have Sculpting Steel enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Perfected by the kinetic sculptor Shanti Makam, these self-assembling metal strands can be coaxed into any shape imaginable.

card.name: Sol Ring
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It took the reclusive Venya Sangmi a lifetime to realize her childhood vision: a band of sunlight made solid.

card.name: Solemn Simulacrum
card.property: When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

card.name: Static Orb
card.property: As long as Static Orb is untapped, players can't untap more than two permanents during their untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Reduction of energy and motion within the stasis field creates the illusion of slowed time.

card.name: Steel Overseer
card.property: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each artifact creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In an unusual foray into the humanoid form, Venand Kapur—known as the Gearherder—built this automaton to keep watch over his clockwork herds.
